com.github.maxstupo.flatengine

Class AssetManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.AssetManager

  • public class AssetManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all assets within the game engine.
    Author:
    Maxstupo

                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                        java.lang.Exception
        Loads assets from a XML file.
        Parameters:
        file - the XML file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given file is null or doesn't exist.
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurred.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears all sprites and fonts from this asset manager.

      • registerSprite

        public boolean registerSprite(java.lang.String key,
                              java.lang.String file)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Register the given image with the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key.
        file - the file of the sprite image.
        Returns:
        true if the manager added the sprite, false if the manager contains the given key.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given key or file are null or the file doesn't exist.

      • registerFont

        public boolean registerFont(java.lang.String key,
                            java.lang.String file)
                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                            java.lang.Exception
        Register a true type font.
        Parameters:
        key - the id of the font.
        file - the font file location.
        Returns:
        true if the font was registered, false if the given key is already used within the manager.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given file was null or the file doesn't exist.
        java.lang.Exception - if the font file format is incorrect, or an I/O error occurred.

      • getFont

        public java.awt.Font getFont(java.lang.String key)
        Returns a font referenced by a given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the font to return.
        Returns:
        the font.

      • getFont

        public java.awt.Font getFont(java.lang.String key,
                             float size)
        Returns a new font with the given size referenced by the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the font to return.
        size - the new font size.
        Returns:
        a new derived font object.
